title: NFL tables 4th-and-15 rule proposal, Jadeveon Clowney turns down Browns, Antonio Brown workouts continue (Football 5/29)
description:
We thought there might be an onside-kick alternative in the NFL in 2020, but not so fast. On Thursday, the '4th-and-15' rule proposal was tabled by owners (3:15), as Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough offer their reactions. The guys also discuss the rules that were passed (8:45) The Pick Six Superfriends then dissect the ongoing free agency of Jadeveon Clowney (20:30), as he reportedly turned down an offer from the Browns. That sparks a separate Baker Mayfield vs. Tyrod Taylor debate (doesn't take much for these guys to go off on a tangent!). Jalen Ramsey's contract situation (31:30), Antonio Brown's viral workouts (40:15) and The Match II between Tiger Woods/Peyton Manning & Phil Mickelson/Tom Brady (45:30) are all covered as well.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
